reviews.review: It's a 4 on 1 cooperative based on horror movies & games. Great game that sucks you in :)
It can be fun it can be for casual player or if you wanna grind. Its not pay to win its all about skill

Gra była Fajna na przełomie 2016/2017/2018 teraz gra zapychana jest kodami na bp zawieszkami i gówno skinami. Eventy nie mają tego czegoś co kiedyś. Gra niestety zeszła na psy cheaterzy nie są banowani. Więc niestety jeżeli ktoś nie przejmie DBD ( inne studio) to możemy pożegnac się z tą gra bo BHVR zależy tylko na pitosie. Updaty mające 2 GB i nie naprawiające tego co powinny, wciskanie LGBT gdzie się da także pożegnajmy tę jakże piękną grę
O jogo precisa melhorar em varios aspectos mais é o meu jogo favorito

ehhh its ok. a bit monotnous, seems like its very hard to be a survivor. the tasks take ages to complete even if you speed them up (with skill checks, ie click at the right time). there are so many upgrades you get with blood points that it takes ages to go through them.
Jogo muito dinâmico e divertido, com varias mecânicas e que vai render varias horas de jogo!

Good game. It take time to play this game and if you play at least 30 hours, you will enjoy it very much. I knew it was really scare for me when I play first time and felt annoying when I play killer. I just want to say it is good game and cheap to buy.

Yeah so, The game itself is perfectly fine and very fun. That is not what this review is about.

Besides that, I give the game .00001 out of 1,000,000,000,000 because the devs gave away my Donkey Jacket and Huntress Mask Lunar Event items to everyone. -----rep, The OG players will understand.

Oh and also, I was a billy main. The nerf was unnecessary. I love you all, goodbye.
        
             Edit: Spelling and getting my awards badge.

repost if you're a true tunnel magnet
Dead By Daylight is a case study about downward spirals.

比较难受的是匹配机制，绿段屠夫经常碰到红段人类，不过车队一般都会烧蛋糕，血点也挺多的，估计还得挨打一段时间才能成长起来。
玩人基本上是有事没事就修机，用猫躲猫猫，帮忙救人，偶尔当当板皇（贴膜不好单圈直接下板），菜的一比，别问，问就是队友全都比我玩的好，所以没怎么感觉到队友问题。

Toxic community, toxic players. Can't say the devs cater to one specific side of players, they don't even bother play testing their own game. It sucks to either killer or survivor.

a really good co-op horror game that can really make your balls drop :) very addicting aswell, I'm looking forward to spend at least 50 or more hours in this game

Edit: I've now spent exactly 100 hours in this game and I'm totally done. It was fun for the first 60 hours but after that it just becane time draining and I wasn't really so addictive anymore. But totally worth the money, just make sure you have a few friends willing to play because solo q is dog :)
Co-op and pvp mode is really fun, scary - but not too scary even for a scare-hare!
It's a lot like tag, except with more murder.
